message.body: So, it occurred to me that we are way overdue for a phone date!! Are you around to chat this weekend maybe?
I mailed our RSVP the other day!
Yayy!! How about sunday then? I think I should be around most of the day :-)
Yea! Sunday later afternoon I'm free!
Can't wait to see you in a few weeks!!
Same!! I'm so glad you'll be able to make it--thank you for trekking down here! And wonderful, I'll give you a call late afternoon Sunday! â™¡
Yay!! Yes Sunday afternoon sounds great. I'm excited for your shower! I'm spending the weekend with Jackie actually so that will be fun!
Oh yay! Lots of good excuses to come down here haha
Yea! I didn't mention the shower before bc I wasn't sure if it was a surprise but then I figured the invite would have said that! :)
Haha good call! Yeah def not a surprise. ..I've had a hand in the menu selection...you know me, picky vegan!
:) excellent ! I'm sure it will be delish!
